powerpagecomponent.content: {"description":"The amount of time the IP address will have to wait if Authentication/LoginThrottling/MaxInvaildAttemptsFromIPAddress occur within Authentication/LoginThrottling/MaxAttemptsTimeLimitTimeSpan amount of time. Default: 00:10:00 (10 mins)","value":"00:10:00"}
powerpagecomponent.name: Authentication/LoginThrottling/IpAddressTimeoutTimeSpan
